table.name: vtiger_ng_block
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_ng_block` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `module_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pointing_block_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pointing_module_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `pointing_field_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `columns` varchar(700) DEFAULT NULL, `cond` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `paginate` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `add_record` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `nr_page` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `sort` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `edit_record` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `delete_record` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence_ngblock` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `destination` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
